name: 123 Kids Fun Education
summary:
Learning Games – 123 Kids Fun Education including counting, colors, geometry, alphabet, math, numbers, shapes sorting, patterns, puzzles, learn to read letters.

123 Kids Fun Education is a collection of 15 entertaining educational games for your preschoolers! These games help millions of parents who homeschool their children and teachers in pre-kindergarten. Preschool Learning Games help children learn in a fun way.
